summary: Replaces some of the female robes with \'Nocturnal Robes\'.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple replacement mod that replaces some of the default robes with the so called \'Nocturnal Robes\' as worn by \'Nocturnal\'.

If you like this mod, please come back to endorse and comment on it, it helps out a lot.
If you want some other armor replaced, just ask in the commends, and i might do a optional download.
Also tell me if you found a glitch.


If you want a retexture or another color of the robes, i suggest:
[url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1040]14 HQ Nocturnal Robe Reskins[/url]

[b]Replaced Robes:[/b]
- Apprentice Robes (of ...)
- Adept Robes (of ...)
- Expert Robes (of ...)
- Master Robes (of ...)
- Archmages Robes

[b]Optional:[/b]
- Novice Robes
- Thalmor Robes


if you wish to not to replace some of these robes, simply remove their folder from: [i]skyrim/data/clothes[/i]

[b]Installation:[/b]
Extract the folder named \'Data\' in your skyrim directory, merge it with the already existing folder. Replace any files if prompted.

[b]Un-installation:[/b]
Remove the following files:[i]
Data\\clothes\\archmage\\f\\archmagerobesf_0.nif
Data\\clothes\\archmage\\f\\archmagerobesf_1.nif
Data\\clothes\\mageapprentice\\mageapprenticerobesf_0.nif
Data\\clothes\\mageapprentice\\mageapprenticerobesf_1.nif
Data\\clothes\\magejourneyman\\magejourneymanrobesf_0.nif
Data\\clothes\\magejourneyman\\magejourneymanrobesf_1.nif
[/i]

[b]Disclaimer:[/b]
I did not create these robes, they are created by Bethesda.

[b]Changelog:[/b]
Ver 1:
Initial Release

Ver 1.1
Fixed a directory issues where forgot to include the \'meshes folder\'.
if you downloaded Ver 1 and it didn\'t work, this is why.
Either download the new version (1.1) or add the folder yourself.
Change it from:
Data/clothes/...
to
Data/meshes/clothes/...
author: Fixz
